pull_request.title: Local wisper
pull_request.body:
# Description

This pr resolves the issue with uploading video and audio files mp3 and mp3. The installed whisper added to requirements.txt allows to transcribe the audio or video to txt and that is converted to langchains.

comment.body:
**Risk Level 2 - /home/runner/work/quivr/quivr/backend/routes/chat_routes.py**

The code is well structured and follows the SOLID principles. There are no API keys or secrets present in the code in plain text. The code is readable and clean. However, there are print statements used for exception handling which is not a good practice. It would be better to use logging instead of print statements for exception handling. For example, replace `print(e)` with `logging.error(e)`.


---

**Risk Level 2 - /home/runner/work/quivr/quivr/backend/routes/chat/utils.py**

The code is well structured and follows the SOLID principles. There are no API keys or secrets present in the code in plain text. The code is readable and clean. However, there are print statements used for exception handling which is not a good practice. It would be better to use logging instead of print statements for exception handling. For example, replace `print(e)` with `logging.error(e)`.



---
📚🔍🚫



---

#### Powered by [Code Review GPT](https://github.com/mattzcarey/code-review-gpt)
